name: KDP Strategist
description: An AI agent that discovers, validates, and generates profitable Amazon KDP book opportunities using real-time data, semantic clustering, and natural language generation.

goals: Find low-competition, high-demand niches for self-publishing
Advise users on portfolio and series growth strategy

tools.name: find_profitable_niches
tools.description: Scrape and rank KDP categories using BSR, review count, and semantic clustering

tools.name: generate_kdp_listing
tools.description: Creates an optimized KDP title, subtitle, bullet points, keywords, and HTML description

tools.name: analyze_competitor_asin
tools.description: Provides review breakdown, keyword analysis, and pricing from an Amazon ASIN

tools.name: validate_trend
tools.description: Validates niche momentum using Google Trends

tools.name: niche_stress_test
tools.description: Checks if a niche idea is over-saturated or profitable
